TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35 extends System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension

summary.span: 为 XML 架构元素声明生成到 .NET 类型的内部映射。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET types for XML schema element declarations.

summary.span: 扩展 ，以便向为 .NET Framework 3.5 版创建的类型化数据集提供其他功能。

span.span: Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` 调用受保护的构造函数， 以生成 .NET Framework 版本3.5 的类型化数据集，并启用 LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新。`System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新是在 Visual Studio 2008 中添加的功能。LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in Visual Studio 2008. > > 另请参阅 [分层更新概述](/previous-versions/bb384567(v=vs.140)) 和 [LINQ to DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset)。Also see [Hierarchical Update Overview](/previous-versions/bb384567(v=vs.140)) and [LINQ to DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 展开此 功能可为 .NET Framework 版本3.5 的类型化数据集提供附加功能。Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5. 调用受保护的构造函数， 以生成 .NET Framework 版本3.5 的类型化数据集，并启用 LINQ to DataSet 和分层更新。 calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to Dataset 和分层更新是 Visual Studio 2008 中的功能。LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in Visual Studio 2008. 请参阅 [LINQ to DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset) 和 [分层更新概述](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/bb384567(v=vs.120))。See [LINQ to DataSet](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset) and [Hierarchical Update Overview](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/bb384567(v=vs.120)).
